title: Mahindra expects to sustain growth momentum in SCV segment next fiscal
description: Mahindra & Mahindra expects to maintain growth in the small commercial vehicles segment next fiscal year by continuously refreshing its range according to customer needs. The company recently introduced the new Supro Profit Truck Excel series, available in diesel and CNG Duo variants, and priced between Rs 6.61 lakh and Rs 6.93 lakh. The company plans to introduce air conditioning to its pick-up range in the near future.
